section.title: Active Members
section.p:
- Rakesh Kalra (rkalra@jmanage.org)

section.title: Contributors
section.p:
- Vandana Taneja - JSR160 test application and other features.
- Nishant - jManage logo and jManage 0.1 UI design.
- Kyrre Lugg - Contributed a number of bug fixes.
If you have contributed to jManage and your name is not listed here, please send an email to rkalra@jmanage.org.

section.title: Like to Contribute?
section.p:
We are actively looking for more contributors.
If you would like to contribute please send us an email at team@jmanage.org and we will get you started.
